characters: Driver of a silver sedan, driver of a beige sedan, driver of a red truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. The silver sedan ahead is maintaining a steady speed, while the beige sedan on the right is attempting to merge into the lane. The red truck on the left is moving at a consistent speed. The traffic is dense, and the self-driving vehicle is maintaining a safe distance from the vehicles ahead.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and keeping a safe distance from the silver sedan ahead. The vehicle is also monitoring the beige sedan on the right, which is attempting to merge into the lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A silver sedan, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Right: A beige sedan, approximately 3 meters away, attempting to merge into the lane. 3) Left: A red truck, approximately 2 meters away, moving at a consistent speed.
